generations.inputText:
Write an ad for the following product

UNLIMEAT Jerky contains the same amount of protein per container as in beef jerky, but 100% plant-based. This means avoiding health risks that come from processed meat, as well as reducing carbon footprint by eating less meat. 
Authentic Korean BBQ and spicy seasonings are added to make it flavorful, even more like beef jerky.
Our technology to extract protein from plants enabled incredible beefy texture found in the product.
We matched and surpassed the nutritional benefits of beef, removed all the cholesterol (zero cholesterol), removed fat (low fat), and we made UNLIMEAT with no artificial ingredients or preservatives.


Tone: Standout, not the typical one

Audience: meat eater

Main focus: Flavor

Make the audience feel craving for the food
generations.text: Looking for a delicious and healthy alternative to traditional beef jerky? Look no further than UNLIMEAT Jerky! Made with plant-based proteins, this snack is perfect for anyone looking to reduce their carbon footprint or avoid processed meat.

generations.text: UNLIMEAT Jerky is the perfect alternative to beef jerky. It's 100% plant-based and contains the same amount of protein as beef jerky, but with all the benefits of a meat-free diet. Plus, our team of experts added authentic Korean BBQ and spicy seasonings to make it even more delicious!

generations.inputText:
Write an ad for the following product

UNLIMEAT Jerky contains the same amount of protein per container as in beef jerky, but 100% plant-based. This means avoiding health risks that come from processed meat, as well as reducing carbon footprint by eating less meat. 
Authentic Korean BBQ and spicy seasonings are added to make it flavorful, even more like beef jerky.
Our technology to extract protein from plants enabled incredible beefy texture found in the product.
We matched and surpassed the nutritional benefits of beef, removed all the cholesterol (zero cholesterol), removed fat (low fat), and we made UNLIMEAT with no artificial ingredients or preservatives.

ALICE
I was just about to head to the grocery store when Bob came over and asked if he could borrow my limes.

BOB
I'm making kbbq with some friends and I need limes for the seasoning.

ALICE
Seriously, Bob? You're asking me for limes?

BOB

text: What's better than BBQ? UNLIMEAT BBQ, of course! Our plant-based jerky has the same amount of protein as beef jerky, but is healthier for you and better for the environment. Plus, our Korean BBQ flavor is so delicious, you won't even miss the meat!
